scripts.pact:provider:cleanup: ps -a | grep 'wait-on' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill -SIGTERM $1 & ps -a | grep 'node ./bin/www' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill -SIGTERM $1 & ps -a | grep 'node test/providerStates.js' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill -SIGTERM $1
scripts.pact:provider:test: npm run start & wait-on 'http://localhost:3002' && npm run pact:provider:states & wait-on 'http://localhost:4011/health' && npm run test
scripts.pact:provider:prepare: npm run pact:provider:cleanup & npm run pact:provider:readyness && npm run start & wait-on 'http://localhost:3002' && npm run pact:provider:states & wait-on 'http://localhost:4011/health' && npm run test
